title: Java Source Attachment Preference Page - Excessive White Space
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page contains a label with a significant amount of white space, causing a layout issue. The vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label positioned in the middle of the page with excessive white space.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page label should be aligned to the beginning, resolving the issue of excessive white space.
SR:
1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Choose 'Java Source Attachment.'
5. [Details] Click on this option to reveal an info label positioned in the middle of the dialog.
